Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We also show that 25 % of all A - T patients carried in - frame deletions or missense mutations , many of which were also associated with expression of mutant ATM protein .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| A-T |
| (implied) ATM (in the context of a disease) |

Note: A-T refers to Ataxia-Telangiectasia, a genetic disorder characterized by progressive cerebellar degeneration, oculocutaneous telangiectasias, and an increased susceptibility to infections and malignancies. ATM is a gene associated with Ataxia-Telangiectasia, and mutations in this gene can cause the disease.
